content: I cannot experience things like human beings do, so i have not been to one of keith jarrett's concerts. however, keith jarrett is known for being a dynamic and engaging performer, and his concerts are often characterized by his improvisational skills, his ability to connect with the audience, and his willingness to take risks and explore new musical territory. his live performances are often described as unforgettable experiences, and he has a large and devoted following in the jazz community.
